about_the_game: Do you want to unlock a new Sealed Play Deck? Gain access to a new set of cards to play through the Sealed Play experience by purchasing a new Sealed Play Deck - Slot 13.
detailed_description: Do you want to unlock a new Sealed Play Deck? Gain access to a new set of cards to play through the Sealed Play experience by purchasing a new Sealed Play Deck - Slot 13.
legal_notice: Wizards of the Coast, Magic: The Gathering, Duels of the Planeswalkers, and their respective logos are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast LLC in the U.S.A. and other countries. Other trademarks are property of their respective owners. TM & © 2013 Wizards of the Coast LLC.
name: Sealed Play Deck - Slot 13

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • OS *: Windows 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU (Pentium 4 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 1GB RAM (2GB for Vista and Windows 7)
  • Hard Disk Space: 1.5 GB HDD
  • Video Card: 512MB DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with Pixelshader 3.0 support
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or later
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional: Local Co-op requires a controller
